page.title: 10HIGH LEIGH, HODDESDON
page.content: Set in 45 acres of gardens & grounds and once the 19th century home of the missionary & banking Barclay family, High Leigh offers excellent conference facilities. As well as a purpose built conference hall for 200, the original house has a second smaller conference room,a dining room for 200,drawing room,several reception rooms,130 bed_ rooms and a Chapel. A games room, tennis courts,a 9 hole putting course & a croquet lawn ensure relaxation for guests. Primarily a conference centre for missionary & Christian Societies, Parish week-ends are frequent,all denominations are welcomed. Many charities including Christian Aid & Save the Children Fund,also youth organisations, womens'groups & Art Councils hold conferences and seminars there. Open all year the 30 staff guarantee smooth running conferences!
